Audio.Locality: Galapagos Road, El Cairo / San Jose del Palmar, Valle del Cauca / Choco, W Andes
Audio.Author: Diego Calderon-F.
Audio.Comments: At least 6 individuals traveling in a mixed flock with Green-and-black Fruiteater [Pipreola riefferii], Orange-breasted Fruiteater [Pipreola jucunda], Sepia-brown [Sharpe's] Wren [Cinnycerthia olivascens] & Tricolored Brush-Finch [Atlapetes tricolor]
